page.title: 20Falling School Rolls
page.content: Although we have only been dealing with one area of the town, it would be appropriate here to mention a feature which is affecting the whole of East Kilbride; the changing school rolls. In the past ten years or so these have fallen dramatically in all areas of the town by as much as 50%. Admittedly these rolls were very high since the original population was composed of a lot of young people with families who moved as part of the overspill plan but what about the next generation?
